name: Hellhound
description: Four legged with no eyes and a long slathering tongue. No tails or fur. Mostly skin and muscle with long claws.

name: Demon Bat
description: 4 wings that end in claws; snout more like a wolf; the rest looks like a normal bat

name: Paralysis Demon
description: Humanoid that's been tortured and disfigured. Can't walk or run normally due to broken limbs. Moves and attacks slowly. Uses its own broken bones that pierce through its skin as a weapon.

name: Arachnid
description: Giant spider the size of a husky. Can climb walls. Glides using its web. Its bites are venomous and can shoot its web to snare players.

name: Blood Golem
description: Humanoid - it's made of an amalgamation of body parts. Lots of blood that oozes from orifices. Is better put together than shambling horror so it can move about as fast as player.

name: Gargoyle
description: A winged nightmare that guards important locations. Humanoid with wings and the head of a lion. It is found guarding particularly valuable treasure. Invulnerable to damage until a puzzle/sacrifice brings them to life.
